  • Method Details

    • conversationService

      public ConversationService conversationService()
      Registers a new conversation.

      Requires that a ConversationService is registered via InteractionHubBuilder.withConversationSystem()

    • startDialog

      public void startDialog(Conversation conversation)
      Registers a new conversation.

      Requires that a ConversationService is registered via InteractionHubBuilder.withConversationSystem()

      Parameters:
      conversation - conversation to start

    • localize

      public String localize(String message, Replacement... replacements)
      Localizes a message with the guild locale if the event happened on a guild. Will use user locale if it happened in a private message.
      Parameters:
      message - message
      replacements - replacements
      Returns:
      localized message

    • guildLocale

      public String guildLocale(String message, Replacement... replacements)
      Localizes the key with the defined language of the guild or by the locale provided by the Localizer.Builder.withLanguageProvider(Function) when the language is the default value.
      Parameters:
      message - message
      replacements - replacements
      Returns:
      localized message

    • userLocale

      public String userLocale(String message, Replacement... replacements)
      Localizes the key with the defined language of the user.
      Parameters:
      message - message
      replacements - replacements
      Returns:
      localized message

    • registerMenu

      public void registerMenu(MenuAction action)
      Registers a new menu action.

      Requires that a MenuService is registered via InteractionHubBuilder.withMenuService(Consumer) or InteractionHubBuilder.withDefaultMenuService()

      Parameters:
      action - action to register

    • registerPage

      public void registerPage(IPageBag page)
      Registers a new page.

      Requires that a PageService is registered via InteractionHubBuilder.withPagination(Consumer) or InteractionHubBuilder.withDefaultPagination()

      Parameters:
      page - page to register

    • registerPage

      public void registerPage(IPageBag page, boolean ephemeral)
      Registers a new page.

      Requires that a PageService is registered via InteractionHubBuilder.withPagination(Consumer) or InteractionHubBuilder.withDefaultPagination()

      Parameters:
      page - page to register
      ephemeral - true so send the reply ephemeral

    • registerModal

      public void registerModal(ModalHandler modalHandler)
      Registers a new modal Requires that a ModalService is registered via InteractionHubBuilder.withModalService(Consumer) or InteractionHubBuilder.withDefaultModalService()
      Parameters:
      modalHandler - modal handler

    • guildLocalizer

      public LocalizationContext guildLocalizer()
      Returns a guild localizer, which uses the Guild.getLocale()
      Returns:
      localizer with guild locale linked

    • localizer

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true) public LocalizationContext localizer()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Removed in favor or guildLocalizer()
      Returns:
      guild localizer

    • userLocalizer

      public LocalizationContext userLocalizer()
      Returns a guild localizer, which uses the Interaction.getUserLocale()
      Returns:
      localizer with user locale linked

    • commandHub

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true) public InteractionHub<?,?,?> commandHub()

      deprecated in favor of interactionHub()
      Returns the command hub
      Returns:
      command hub

    • interactionHub

      public InteractionHub<?,?,?> interactionHub()
      Returns the interaction hub, which dispatched the interaction
      Returns:
      interaction hub instance

    • entitlements

      public SkuMeta entitlements()
      Returns the list of entitlements for the current guild and user. If this interaction is not from a guild, it will only contain entitlements of the user.
      Returns:
      list of entitlements
